events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund for this order.
The case has been reviewed and identified as a refund request related to a sizing issue with the purchased jacket.
Your request has been assigned to a customer support agent who specializes in refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support about your jacket. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Yes, my order number is 874392 and the jacket is unused plus it’s still in the original packaging as I just received it yesterday.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once the jacket is returned. I will email you a prepaid return label.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label to send it back.
I have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the returned jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
We wanted to follow up to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to check if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I dropped off the package two days ago. Thank you for checking in, I will wait for the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been successfully processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are closing this case now, but if you have any more questions or issues please do not hesitate to contact us again.
